dict.acceptation: 承担，从事；保证；同意，答应；承诺；

sent.orig: And to undertake finishing and processing operations, to undertake small and medium-sized bulk orders.
sent.trans: 并可承接精加工及来料加工业务，可承接中小批量定单。

sent.orig: The company plans to undertake, the processing business can also undertake physical mapping after manufacture.
sent.trans: 本公司承接来图、来料加工业务也可承接实物进行测绘后加工制作。

sent.orig: Is there anything here that we should not undertake, or that we cannot undertake and achieve?
sent.trans: 这些是不应做、不能做、做不到的事吗？

sent.orig: The article plans how to undertake with respect to accountant business accounting taxation plans undertake discussing.
sent.trans: 本文拟就会计核算如何进行税收筹划进行探讨。

sent.orig: Involve as many people as you can in any effort you undertake.
sent.trans: 不论做任何事情，让尽量多的人参与其中。
